# Cryogenic-UltraMicrotome System Tender

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** CB-977-56701534
* **Solicitation Number:** 23-58125
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 18, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Publication Date:** February 6, 2024
* **Amendment Date:** March 18, 2024

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** The tender is covered under the following trade agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Alberta
* **Regions of Delivery:** Edmonton, Alberta

## Tender Description

The National Research Council Canada (NRC)’s Nanotechnology Research Centre (NANO) has a requirement for the supply of a Cryogenic-UltraMicrotome System (ultramicrotome). The delivery will be requested in Edmonton, Alberta. This requirement is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI, and only suppliers currently pre-qualified on this arrangement have been invited to bid.

The tender is based on the following:

* The lowest aggregate price
* Compliance with the mandatory technical criteria

Only bidders holding a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada are eligible to submit a bid. Bidders who do not have a Supply Arrangement for this category cannot submit a bid.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* Sylvianne Beaulne
* Email: sylvianne.beaulne@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 553-1211

## Important Notes

* This tender is under the UN/SPSC Category: 41102900 - Histology equipment
* The tender is open to pre-qualified suppliers only
* Bids received from suppliers not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement will not be evaluated
* Suppliers can qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19E
